New Records: Damian Lillard scored 34 points with four three-pointers, his third straight 30-point game.
Giannis Antetokounmpo added 31 points and 16 rebounds.
Bobby Portis contributed 19 points off the bench.
Key Match Events: Milwaukee's decisive third-quarter performance, outscoring Utah 31-16 to take command.
The game marked Milwaukee's first home win of the season after a 1-6 start.
Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee started the season 1-6, leaving them near the Eastern Conference's bottom.
Post-Match Reflections: Damian Lillard expressed relief and pride in the win after a challenging start.
Giannis Antetokounmpo highlighted the team's resilience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Minnesota Timberwolves and San Antonio Spurs also won their respective games.
